duties_responsibilities.duty: Assess the feasibility of proposed engineering solutions, equipment, or processes
Review design deliverables and develop engineering scope of work documents
Perform/review electrical calculations and studies with the aid of ETAP software
Work on medium voltage power distribution networks, including substations and overhead/underground distribution & transmission lines
Work on low voltage and medium voltage power distribution networks in manufacturing plants and open-pit mines

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in Electrical Engineering or other related field (2019, 2020) or working towards graduation in 2021
